## Installation

You can install the released version of silander from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("silander")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(silander)
source("~/Documents/USC/P3/optimal-solution/baseline.R")
# simulate data
set.seed(1234)
mydata = simdat(n.var = 15)

# silander results
links.s = baseline_sfun(mydata)
links.s = sfun(mydata)





```
